content.en: Algorithm reuse: Researchers have explored various research questions related to algorithms in software development. These questions include understanding the challenges in reusing algorithms in object-oriented programming, the role of data abstraction in engineering software development, and how algorithms can be recast as objects to encourage reuse. The agency of algorithms is attributed to different approaches and techniques, such as object-oriented programming, functional models, and designing flexible reusable software components. These studies aim to improve software development practices and address the complexities and obstacles associated with algorithm reuse.
content.da: Algoritmegenbrug: Forskere har udforsket forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til algoritmer i softwareudvikling. Disse spørgsmål omfatter forståelse af udfordringerne ved at genbruge algoritmer i objektorienteret programmering, dataabstraktions rolle i ingeniørmæssig softwareudvikling og hvordan algoritmer kan omformes til objekter for at fremme genbrug. Algoritmers handlingskraft tilskrives forskellige tilgange og teknikker, såsom objektorienteret programmering, funktionelle modeller og design af fleksible genanvendelige softwarekomponenter. Disse studier sigter mod at forbedre softwareudviklingspraksis og adressere kompleksiteterne og hindringerne forbundet med algoritmegenbrug.
